name: myneChocolate
description:
You were hoping to relax today having a nice cup of hot cocoa... Only to find out that there are chocolate bombs inside it! Try to eat all the marshmallows without finding any chocolate bomb!

Code by dark0dave

Extra assets used:
https://opengameart.org/content/steam
https://opengameart.org/content/sky-backdrop
https://opengameart.org/content/light-wood-1024x1024
https://opengameart.org/content/town-theme
